about_the_game:
Set sail in Wyrd Waters, a tactical multiplayer naval experience where strategy meets mythological chaos! Drawing from Anglo-Saxon folklore, this fantastical world is filled with ancient sea monsters, powerful fleets, and treacherous waters.

Gather your crew—or battle against them—in matches for up to 8 players. Customize your fleet, choose your ships wisely, and master the art of naval warfare. Whether you’re defending against monstrous sea creatures or outsmarting your friends, every match is a unique challenge!

Wyrd Waters combines fast, thrilling PvP combat with a tactical edge, making each battle an intense test of skill and strategy. With new maps and ships regularly unlocking as you play, no two games are ever the same.

Features:

  • Epic Naval Battles: Command a variety of ships, each with its own strengths and tactical advantages. Plan your strategy carefully, but be prepared for the fog of war—and what lurks beneath the waters.

  • Mythological Setting: Explore a world steeped in Anglo-Saxon folklore. From kraken-infested waters to mythical realms, the environment is as dangerous as your enemies.

  • Multiplayer Mayhem: Host or join matches with up to 8 players in PvP mode. Battle for victory, but remember: defeat is only temporary—there’s always time for a rematch!

  • Replayability: Keep your friends on their toes with new ships, maps, and strategies. Outwit your opponents and unlock more content as you play.

  • Community-Driven Updates: Post-launch support will bring even more chaos to the seas, with future expansions exploring new mythologies and additional game mechanics.

Are you ready to set sail and dominate the seas?

Key Features

  • Multiplayer tactical combat: Face off against friends in naval PvP for up to 8 players.

  • Strategic fleet building: Choose the right combination of ships for the battle ahead.

  • Rich mythological world: Immerse yourself in a fantastical reimagining of the Anglo-Saxon era.

  • Constantly evolving gameplay: Unlock new ships, maps, and mechanics with every match.

Replayability: Endless battles, new strategies, and chaotic fun with your crew.

Join the crew!

Wishlist Wyrd Waters now on Steam and be the first to conquer the seas when the game launches! Don’t miss out on updates, community events, and special playtests—join our Discord for all the latest news.
